Welcome back, Kinger!

::Neody::

Neody recieves the message on his way to the battle at the
Cybertronian Fire. He looks up to see if Ramjet would react to it.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@y...> wrote:
> OCC: I have decided to return to the rpg. If my
> schedule makes it too hard for me too keep up I will
> have to leave again but I will do my best to keep that
> from happening. Oh by the way. I vote for yanshosh to
> be permanent on the counil.
> 
>   The vortex opened. Out came three bots. They had
> been sent back on orders by thier leader. As a special
> favor. Out came Apocalypse......God Neptune and the
> original Guiledart. Apocalypse moved his wrist comm to
> his mouth. "Destrons of the new.I am War general
> Apocalypse of the destron army.(he was reformated to
> destron by Guiledart when he found his broken body
> after the fight between Galvatron and Prime and
> Magmatron quickly made him his general of war). My
> science officer Guiledart and my 1st soilder God
> Neptune are here also. We have orders from Magmatron
> to join your ranks in help of your aid in this war.We
> are the destrons of old."
